SEARCH
Package com.kapia.jobboard.api.data.service

Class JobOfferService

java.lang.Object
com.kapia.jobboard.api.data.service.JobOfferService
@Service public class JobOfferService extends Object
The JobOfferService class is responsible for providing various operations related to job offers. It interacts with the JobOfferRepository, CompanyRepository, AddressRepository, TechnologyRepository, and JobOfferTechnologyRepository to perform CRUD operations and retrieve job offer data. This class also utilizes caching to improve performance for certain operations.

      sortingOrder - The order to sort job offers by.
      Returns:
      A list of job offers sorted by created date in ascending order.
